body:
The zip archive provided by GitHub have the proper permission bit set and the unzip tool on Plan 9 seems to handle them correctly. However, it seems the Plan 9 file system doesn't acknowledge them properly.

Extracting the tar.gz archive provided by GitHub works fine.

Here is a comparison between tar and zip:
https://www.diffchecker.com/ro2krd2g

Let's discuss it elsewhere, since it's a Plan 9 bug and not a Go bug.
